description: "Smile, Darn Ya, Smile"; "Shuffle Off to Buffalo"; "Page Miss Glory"; "I Love to Singa"; "Odor-Able Kitty"; "Daffy Duck and Egghead"; "Walky Talky Hawky"; "Katnip Kollege" and more are included in this fun-filled video of classic ...
keywords: compilation of short films,compilation of animated films,studio compilation,compilation,looney tunes
name: The Golden Age of Looney Tunes - Volume 1
